name: Idle Light City
description:
Welcome to Idle Light City! The city is in dark, it need your help to light up the whole city. Run a lightbulb factory and produce as many lightbulbs as you can, unlock new buildings, lit them up to earn money.
- Discover lots of buildings
- Meet Bulb King
- Enjoy amusement park
- Prestige feature
- Powerful boosters
